```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
babies <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ervance1/Sp2018-Data-Science-repo/master/babies2a.dat")
babies <- rename(babies, bwtoz = `bwt/oz`)
babies <- na.omit(babies)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = babies, mapping = aes(x = as.factor(Premature), y = mpregwt, color = as.factor(smoke))) + geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_discrete(name="Smoking",
  breaks=c("0", "1"),
  lables=c("Non Smoker", "Smoker"))
  labs(x = "Premature") 
```
